How to contribute

There are various ways you could contribute to PODAM:

  • By forking PODAM source code from GitHub and submit code contributions.
  • By joining our Google group and join the discussion.
  • By submitting a bug. In this case, please submit a bug at https://github.com/mtedone/podam/issues. When submitting a bug, please ensure the following is defined:
    • The failing POJO (of in case of copyright issues, a POJO which reflects the problem)
    • A description of the problem (e.g. why you think PODAM didn't work properly)
  • By submitting new feature requests at https://github.com/mtedone/podam/issues. When submitting a feature request, please attach the POJO (of in case of copyright issues, a similar POJO) for which you would like the new feature.
  • By providing feedback. This can be done by starting a discussion on our Google group

Happy technology!
